# Security Documentation

This directory houses all security-related documentation for the Summit project.

## Contents

- `npm-audit-report.md` - NPM dependency vulnerability audit reports
- `VULNERABILITY_ANALYSIS.md` - Detailed analysis of identified vulnerabilities
- Patch tracking and remediation strategy documentation

## Purpose

Centralized location for:
- Supply chain attack audit results
- Vulnerability assessment reports
- Dependency tree analysis
- Remediation tracking and verification

## Related Issues

- Linear: SUM-10263 - Batch 1: Critical npm & Python Runtime Vulnerabilities
- Focus: CVSS 9.8 vulnerabilities in debug, chalk, color, ansi-regex packages
